mapper.update: update t_dishtype set dishTypeName = #{dishtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dishTypeDesc = #{dishtypedesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delFlag = #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lastSubTime = #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where dishTypeID = #{dishtypeid,jdbcType=TINYINT}
mapper.select: select dishTypeID, dishTypeName, dishTypeDesc, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy from t_dishtype
